|brand = SparkLAN |model = WPET-232 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ACN |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 23, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SparkLAN_WPET-232ACN |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = 3026 (half size)
|vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8812 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8812AE, NDD9564781213 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/04/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "EW-7822MAC V1.0X" and "P/C=C25-A12" is silkscreened on the board {{see also|SparkLAN|Edimax}}
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Realtek]] [[Realtek#ac|RTL8812AE]] :‧ Standard: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2T2R :‧ Supports 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM :‧ Antenna: 2x U.FL connectors :‧ Data rate: 300Mbps (11n MSC15), 867Mbps (VHT MCS9) :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, 802.1x, WPS :‧ Interface: PCI Express; support Linux, Windows
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.sparklan.com/p3-filedown.php?PKey=7e3cBdnic_C35sAX0gAjqOtaT1iSOgVDMIXQnx5ZeI4 Datasheet] *[http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan559.html On '''EmbeddedWorks'''] ([http://site.embeddedworks.net/_ewdownloads/wlan559/wlan559_WPET-232ACN_datasheet_v1.1.pdf datasheet])
